Construction on the Lair begins.
Construction on the Hall begins.
Character is already on a mission.
You undergo combat training for the next six to nine months.
Adds an On Patrol modifier for the next six months.
Adds an Extortion modifier for the next six months.
Puts in motion a prison break attempt sometime in the next 30 days.
Spend Time With has a 30 day cooldown.
This option sets your beastiality preferences for Heroes and Villains content.
Potential pregnancy
Success!
Failed, but not noticed
Failed and noticed
Gives tech points or a character modifier after six to nine months.
NPC has multiple image options available.
Character is available to go on an adventure.
Visit Tower has a 30 day cooldown
Visit Grand Inn has a 30 day cooldown
A random mage will arrive at your court.
Allows a woman to grow a dick (become a futa).
Establishs a bond with a Symbiote, gaining the Symbiote/Tentacle-kin trait.
Go from guy to gal or gal to guy. May complicate things in the game. Be careful with its use.
Straight from the Fountain of Youth! Said wind back the clock ten years.
For those who believe that more is better.
For those who believe that more is better.
Forces the body to heal minor wounds and afflictions. If none exist, it emboldens the body, improving overall health.
A miracle drug that heals severe wounds and afflictions, although it may not remove the worst.
A potion that can reshape the user to appear more alluring. Does not address wounds.
A potion that opens the mind to the world around it. Can result in insight gains or mental trauma.
Makes short people into 'normal' people. Makes normal people into Giants.
Does your blood hold a link to the myths or lore from your cultures past?
A potion that is said to contain the distilled blood of an Elder Vampire.
A potion that gives one engineering insight, allowing improved speed and fiscal focus during construction.
Used on yourself, it makes you more alluring. Given as a gift, you may gain a new love.
Removes any spell cooldowns that are in place. Can be held and used later or gifted to another.
Expect training to take about a year, with chances to be done sooner or later.
